Up.Statement: IF EXISTS (SELECT 'fixed_purchase_kbn1_setting2' FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_ShopShipping' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'fixed_purchase_kbn1_setting2') BEGIN UPDATE w2_ShopShipping SET fixed_purchase_kbn1_setting2 = REPLACE(fixed_purchase_kbn1_setting2, '月末', '-1') WHERE fixed_purchase_kbn1_setting2 LIKE '%月末%' END GO
